data.title: Academic Awards and Honors
data.meta_description: See a list of academic awards, honors and recognition given by Elmhurst University. These include the Elmhurst Dean's List, senior of the year, and more.
data.text:
Celebrating Achievement at Elmhurst

It is our proud honor at Elmhurst University to award students, faculty, alumni and others who go above and beyond what is asked of them.

Below are just some of the accomplishments for which the University bestows recognition.

The Elmhurst University Dean’s List

All Elmhurst University students who, during the Fall or Spring terms, have attained a semester grade-point average of 3.75 or above are placed on the Dean’s List. Those who have attained such excellent academic performance will be named below and their letter from the Dean and their certificate can be found as a Certificate in their Merit account.

2024 Spring Term

Other Honors, Awards and Recognition

The Niebuhr Medal

The Niebuhr Medal is the University’s highest honor, recognizing extraordinary service to humanity.

Student Leadership Awards

These annual awards are given to students who show leadership and dedication to organizations that help bring the campus closer together.

Faculty Awards

The President’s Award for Excellence in Teaching | Nominate

The Dr. Andrew K. Prinz Faculty and Staff Merit Award

Faculty Awards at Founders’ Honors Convocation

Alumni Awards and Recognition
